key_risks: Legal and regulatory challenges, including class-action lawsuits and FDA compliance issues
Product liability risks due to potential misuse of devices by unqualified physicians
Economic sensitivity to downturns and reduced consumer discretionary spending
Intense competitive pressures in the aesthetic device market
controversies: Class-action lawsuit alleging misleading investors and hiding FDA compliance issues
Accusations of offering to replace defective products only with confidentiality agreements
social_issues: Ethical concerns over confidentiality agreements with non-disparagement clauses
governance_issues: Allegations of deceptive practices by company executives
Potential governance issues related to handling of FDA compliance and investor communications
